definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: As requested by disciple Xin Ping I had written the new poem in calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 應弟子心平之提請，我已寫了新詩之翰墨。

sentences.english: Each is brought to the ring and allowed to attack a picador who pricks them with a lance.
sentences.chinese: 每個提請環，並允許攻擊皮卡多爾誰用長矛刺破他們。

sentences.english: As requested by a disciple one poem is written in calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 應一弟子提請，一詩作已手書成。

sentences.english: As requested by a disciple today's poem in calligraphy is attached.
sentences.chinese: 應一弟子的提請，今日的詩作寫成翰墨已附呈。

sentences.english: C. Discussion on Freshman English course for DFLL majors.
sentences.chinese: 有關檢討外文系大一英文課程案，提請討論。

sentences.english: As requested by disciple Hai Ying below I had written the name of the seal in calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 應弟子海鸚如下的提請，我已手書一法印的名稱了。

sentences.english: I will write the Gatha you requested.
sentences.chinese: 我將寫您所提請的普賢大圓滿偈。

sentences.english: As requested by disciple Jing Xing below I had written the long mantra of Vaishravana Heavenly King in calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 應弟子敬行以下之提請，我已手書了北方天王的長咒。

sentences.english: As requested by disciple Jing Xing below I had written one poem by Guru Chen in calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 應弟子敬行以下的提請我己手書了陳上師的一首詩作。

sentences.english: As requested by disciple Ben Jing below I had written the calligraphy for his study.
sentences.chinese: 應弟子本敬以下之提請，我已爲他的書房寫了翰墨。

sentences.english: Then the court adjourns to deliberate onwhether any witnesses should be heard.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，法庭休庭，商討是否應該提請任何證人作證。

sentences.english: Let me draw your attention to just two.
sentences.chinese: 我僅提出兩方面，提請你們注意。

sentences.english: My unearthly hunger drew me away from you.
sentences.chinese: 我神祕的飢餓提請我離開你。

sentences.english: So Zhi Xuan's request below will be satisfied with more adornments added to the image.
sentences.chinese: 因此，智宣以下的提請將會有更多的裝飾在圖像中。

sentences.english: I. Language Instructor Christian Hein's application for change of appointment as full-time assistant professor.
sentences.chinese: 漢駿緯語言講師改聘專任助理教授申請案，提請討論。

sentences.english: Disciple Hong Fu spent 3 days to write up the request attached for these two poems.
sentences.chinese: 弟子虹福花了三天的時間寫了附呈之兩首詩的提請文。
